titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 59) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules; providing for proceedings during the period from December 14, 2013, through January 6, 2014; and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-290, by Mr. Woodall.

Resolution provides for consideration of the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.J.Res. 59; provides for motions to suspend the rules; and provides for proceedings during the period from December 14, 2013, through January 6, 2014.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 78.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 438.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 195 (Roll no. 637).
The House resumed with voting on H. Res. 438.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 195 (Roll no. 638).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/11/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 59) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules; providing for proceedings during the period from December 14, 2013, through January 6, 2014.
